infotexts.entitydescription.latexide: Used for latex infections, especially preemptively. The window to act after infection is very short.
infotexts.entitydescription.protogenhelmet: Latexide woven into the fur around this helmet prevents latex from reaching the wearer's brain. Won't protect your body.
infotexts.entitydescription.protogensuitassistant: A warm outfit protecting the wearer from swift death by bodily latex contact.
infotexts.entitydescription.protogensuitmech: A warm outfit protecting the wearer from swift death by bodily latex contact.
infotexts.entitydescription.protogensuitengi: A warm outfit protecting the wearer from swift death by bodily latex contact.
infotexts.entitydescription.protogensuitmed: A warm outfit protecting the wearer from swift death by bodily latex contact.
infotexts.entitydescription.protogensuitsb: A warm outfit protecting the wearer from swift death by bodily latex contact.
infotexts.entitydescription.protogensuitcap: A warm outfit protecting the wearer from swift death by bodily latex contact.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.transfurdark: A black goo is rapidly enveloping the lower body.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.transfurdark.fatal: The black goo is incorporating the body. Nothing can be done.
infotexts.causeofdeathself.transfurdark: Your body has been completely consumed by the black latex.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.transfurwhite: White goo is racing up the body, looking for a point of entry to the brain.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.transfurwhite.fata: The white goo is pouring in through the nostrils. Nothing can be done.
infotexts.causeofdeathself.transfurwhite: Your brain has been pacified by the presence in your mind, and you relax as you let it take control.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.transfurresistance: The latexide being secreted from your body repels latex that comes into contact with you.
